content: 2 stitches together knit knit k tbl knit through the back loop purl purl ssk sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise place both sts back on the left needle and k2tog through the back loop pm place marker bor beginning of round sm slip marker repeat sts between brackets the indicated number of times sl1 slip 1 st purlwise with yarn at back yo bring the yarn forward and then over the right hand needle to create a stitch 3 lemon drizzle socks by debbie ford drizzle pattern chart drizzle pattern written instructions row 1 p1 k3 yo k4 k2tog k2 × 2 yo k4 k2tog p1 27 sts row 2 and all even-numbered rounds knit row 3 p1 k4 yo k3 k2tog k3 × 2 yo k3 k2tog p1 row 5 p1 k5 yo k2 k2tog k4 × 2 yo k2 k2tog p1 row 7 p1 k6 yo k1 k2tog k5 × 2 yo k1 k2tog p1 row 9 p1 k7 yo k2tog k6 × 2 yo k2tog p1 row 11 p1 ssk k4 yo k2 × 2 ssk k4 yo k3 p1 row 13 p1 ssk k3 yo k3 × 2 ssk k3 yo k4 p1 row 15 p1 ssk k2 yo k4 × 2 ssk k2 yo k5 p1 row 17 p1 ssk k1 yo k5 × 2 ssk k1 yo k6 p1 row 19 p1 ssk yo k6 × 2 ssk yo k7 p1 i love seeing what you make tag your photos with @daisystitches and use the hashtags #lemondrizzlesocks and #debbieforddesigns this pattern has been tested and tech edited for pattern support you can email me at de88ieford@yahoo co uk 4 lemon drizzle socks by debbie ford
